resources.string:
Volume Panel:
\u2022A flexible replacement for your system volume controls.

Designed & Developed By:
\u2022 Lee Bailey (AKA @LeeDrOiD)
Additional Thanks:
\u2022 The Great Dane - AKA Bo.
\u2022 The creators of App Intro.
\u2022 Ereza for Custom Activity On Crash.
\u2022 D-Max for Spots Dialog.
Translations By:
\u2022 Linar10 - Polish
\u2022 Fatih Firinci - Turkish
\u2022 guillerag - Spanish
\u2022 Nuno Nebeker - Portuguese
\u2022 Игорь Иринин - Russian
\u2022 Sylm - Français
\u2022 Emad Ayad - Arabic
\u2022 VM - German
\u2022 Alpert7 - Chinese
\u2022 Nguy\u1ec5n Lam - Vietnamese
\u2022 Jakub - Chzech
\u2022 Amharic - Mikesew1320

Feel free to contact me via the \"Email Feedback\" option & don\'t forget to leave a review 😀

Accessibility Access 

This permission allows us to: 
• Detect volume +\- key presses. 
• Provide lock screen overlays. 
• Provide additional shortcuts. 

No other content is captured. 

Some devices may require a reboot to start the service.
\u2022 Follow system Dark/Light mode. \n\u2022 Manufacturer support required.

Volume Panel is being optimised by the system & may be killed in the background.

None of the services in Volume Panel are battery intensive, but disabling optimisation will improve reliability.

Click \"Close\" to run optimised or click \"Action Now\" followed by \"All Apps\" then disable Battery Optimisation for Volume Panel.

If you find that the service is still being killed by the system, try enabling the "Force Keep Services Alive" Option.
i: Recalibrate Maximum Brightness: \n\u2022 Set your screen brightness to Max then long press here.
\u2022 May interfere with other apps when enabled.

Do Not Disturb Access 

This permission allows us to modify Do Not Disturb Settings.

Only use this option if volume panel keeps stopping.

Some devices are too aggressive when freeing up memory and kill important services, applications with Admin rights are rarely killed.

Enabling basic Admin rights for Volume Panel will keep our services alive.

You will have to disable this option if you ever need to uninstall the app.
\u2022 Volume panel will not open in these applications.
Failed to add window, please open the app and make sure Screen Overlay permissions have been granted
Volume Panel Free is currently overriding the system volume panel, please disable it to avoid conflicts.

The Volume Panel accessibility service has been stopped or removed by the system. \n\nIf this was not intentional, please try the \"Force Keep Services Alive\" option in the app and ensure battery optimisation is disabled for Volume Panel.
Please make sure you are using the latest version.
Long press & drag items to rearrange.

We may have detected a Button Remapping application. 

Button Remappers use accessibility services to detect button clicks. 

Other accessibility services capturing/customising volume button clicks will interfere with Volume Panels ability to intercept the volume buttons. 

Please consider disabling volume button customisation for those apps. 

Alternatively, enable the "Volume Panel" launcher shortcut and open it with a remap!
Activity not found, please navigate to Settings and grant manually

Notification Access 

• This permission allows us to detect active Casting or Streaming. 
• If you wish to run without controlling cast streams, feel free to skip this permission. 

No notification content is captured.

Not all devices support splitting Notification, System & Ring volume.

If both sliders change together, this is due to your system configuration and nothing to do with Volume Panel.
Oops.. It looks like something went wrong and Volume Panel crashed, please hit \"SEND REPORT\" below to let me know.
System Overlay \n\nThis permission is required for us to display the Volume Panel over other apps.

Permissions Required 

In order to override the system volume panel, several permissions are required. 

We will now show you several screens detailing those permissions, their usage & a button to enable them.
Once complete, press back to return to the app.
Preview Mode: Call & Cast panels will only show when needed.

Enjoying Volume Panel.

Please leave a review in the play store!

\u2b50\u2b50\u2b50\u2b50\u2b50
Volume Panel needs to be granted access to write System Settings, please press proceed to continue.\n

When enabling any accessibility service you will be presented with a generic Android system warning, for your peace of mind, Volume Panel does not capture any other keys or content & does not have or request permission connect to the internet.

Tips:

Audio doesn\'t change in some apps:

Some apps like Instagram & Snapchat take complete audio focus & attempt to capture audio buttons them selves, if you experience this issue, please enable the \"Exclude Applications\" option and add the offending apps to the list.

The system audio panel keeps returning:

It\'s highly likely that your system is killing the Volume Panel accessibility service, if this happens, please make sure battery & memory optimisation is disabled for the app, enabling the \"Swipe Up/Down Trigger\" may help too.
For more information visit: http://www.dontkillmyapp.com/
\u2022 The panel will only launch when Volume + is pressed.

Usage Access 

This permission allows us to detect the application currently in use via package usage stats & check if you have excluded it. 

If you wish to run without excluding applications, feel free to skip this permission.
This application has been modified and will not run, re-directing to the play store

V20.38:
\u2022 Add gradient slider colours.
\u2022 Add gradient border colours.
\u2022 Hungarian translation test.
\u2022 Block outside touches in sort dialogs.
\u2022 Adjust icon padding with borders.

V20.34:
\u2022 Add Power Menu Shortcut.
\u2022 Change Ring Volume restoration logic.
\u2022 Improve shortcut row split logic.
\u2022 Clean up app blacklist screen.
\u2022 Translation Updates.

V20.27:
\u2022 Fix panel not being removed on close.
\u2022 Override animation duration on shortcut click.
\u2022 Fix orientation shortcut not showing without accessibility.
\u2022 Improve trigger refresh method.
\u2022 Fix crash on app update/restart.
\u2022 Only show trigger preview mode (blue) when trigger settings expanded.
\u2022 Add panel preview button to dialogs.
\u2022 Translation updates.
\u2022 Design presets layout adjustments.
\u2022 Fix panel intermittently not closing.
\u2022 Add option to rearrange shortcuts.
\u2022 Only show enabled panels and shortcuts in reorder activities.

V20.17:
\u2022 Faster fragment switching.
\u2022 Scroll design presets vertically.
\u2022 Fix memory leak in accessibility.
\u2022 Restart services if accessibility is interrupted.
\u2022 Rewrite trigger logic & adjust sensitivity.
\u2022 Trigger long press to change volume improvements.
\u2022 Make long press trigger optional.

V20.14:
\u2022 Make help text scrollable & add links.
\u2022 Fix media icon with BT connected.
\u2022 Fix disabling usage access.
\u2022 Change panel scale labels to slider length and icon scale.
\u2022 Fix crash in panel start with first click enabled.
\u2022 Panel border layout corrections.
\u2022 Display individual slider colours in dialog.
\u2022 New dialog animations.
\u2022 Fix colour picker scaling on low res devices.
\u2022 Translation Updates.
\u2022 Bug fixes.

V20.09:
\u2022 Disable audible feedback if media active.
\u2022 Fix preview button background.
\u2022 Merge footer colour with background.
\u2022 Change nav & status icons to match activity.
\u2022 Additional measures to keep accessibility services alive.
\u2022 Remove delay from first click changes.
\u2022 Handler & close logic adjustments.
\u2022 Bug fixes.

V20.04:
\u2022 App UI Overhaul.
\u2022 New Design Presets.
\u2022 Launcher Icon corrections.
\u2022 Colour Picker adjustments.
\u2022 Add Wallpaper colour pallet to colour picker (where available).
\u2022 Panel margin/spacing corrections.
\u2022 Reduce panel elevation (shadows clipped).
\u2022 Add shadow layer to text labels.

V11.95:
\u2022 Allow volume adjustment on trigger long press and slide.
\u2022 Fix initial shortcuts not showing in collapsed view.
\u2022 Panel Scale and border improvements.
\u2022 Translation Updates.
\u2022 Bug Fixes.

V11.93:
\u2022 Split screen shortcut Android 7+.
\u2022 Add Chzech translation - thanks Jakub.
\u2022 Horizontal slider size & scale adjustments.
\u2022 Make trigger swipe inwards optional.
\u2022 Hide call panel mute microphone button with settings icons.
\u2022 Add Mute Microphone shortcut.
\u2022 Reorganise settings layout.
\u2022 Do not fire panel close when seek bar is tracking.
\u2022 Panel scaling corrections.
\u2022 Correct scaled corner radius in merged & horizontal panels.
\u2022 Split merged panel shortcuts into 2 rows.

V11.79:
\u2022 Android 6 Crash fix.
\u2022 Translations update.

V11.78:
\u2022 Automatically obtain system max brightness value.
\u2022 Fix status and navigation bar overlaps.
\u2022 Make rounding the top of solid sliders optional.
\u2022 Fix merged icon tinting & default merged tint in dark mode.
\u2022 Bug fix in long press media toggle to launch media player.

V11.77:
\u2022 Add Split Screen, Lock Screen & Orientation Shortcuts.
\u2022 Use custom picker for configuration import/export.
\u2022 Add option to dim behind the panel.
\u2022 Only ask for storage path on first config export.
\u2022 Make floating trigger swipe omnidirectional.
\u2022 Add option to flip/change icon position.
\u2022 Allow customising seek bar on/off colours & thumb.
\u2022 Show slider colour pickers in sequence.
\u2022 Fix crash in audible feedback.
\u2022 Use compatibility themes to fix crashes on some devices.

V11.64:
\u2022 Horizontal slider layout adjustments.
\u2022 Add option to merge icons into solid sliders.
\u2022 Introduce "Design Presets".
\u2022 Click outside to close corrections.
\u2022 Add Import/Export configuration.
\u2022 Allow custom solid slider background.
\u2022 Enable floating trigger everywhere when accessibility enabled.
\u2022 Do not disable accessibility when turning button override off.
\u2022 Amharic translations test.
\u2022 Correct height & width scaling.
\u2022 Fix shortcut position in horizontal sliders.
\u2022 Shadow & margin corrections.

V11.44:
\u2022 Fix horizontal slider direction in right handed mode.
\u2022 Fix dialog crash when no overlay permissions granted.
\u2022 Translation Corrections

V11.39:
\u2022 Introduce custom SeekBar class.
\u2022 Fix thumb shadow in solid sliders.
\u2022 Fix horizontal SeekBar device compatibility.
\u2022 Add padding when merged panels enabled.
\u2022 Animation adjustments.
\u2022 Preview mode corrections.

V11.38:
\u2022 Swipe to open panels when collapsed.
\u2022 Move to accessibility overlays.
\u2022 New true lock screen overlay.
\u2022 Improve horizontal slider expand animation.
\u2022 New Vertical slider Merge Panels option.
\u2022 Auto scale panels if over height or width.
\u2022 True left handed support for horizontal sliders.
\u2022 Fix bleed in solid sliders with border.
\u2022 Improve tint methods to allow for transparency.
\u2022 Add option to block background touches.
\u2022 Apply margin horizontal to shortcut container.
\u2022 Bug fixes.

V11.28:
\u2022 New Horizontal Sliders option!
\u2022 Optional level label colour.
\u2022 Separate solid fill border colour.
\u2022 Fix Colour Picker context menu.
\u2022 Permissions flow improvements.
\u2022 Sort panels logic improvements.
\u2022 UI adjustments & performance improvements.

V11.17:
\u2022 Add Vietnamese, Chinese, French & German translations.
\u2022 Add Solid Sliders option to fill vertically.
\u2022 UI & Dialog Enhancements.
\u2022 Translation Updates.
\u2022 Auto Dark enabled as default.
\u2022 Fix Media Controller showing when off.
\u2022 Add automatic backup/restore using google APIs.
\u2022 Fix Long Press Delays..
Tip: Click here to enable Volume Panel accessibility services, this will allow the floating trigger & volume panel to be used in the lock screen.
This will overwrite your current layout, press proceed to continue.
Access error, please try a different directory.
Please watch the following full screen advertisement to temporarily unlock this option.
Long press start, center or end to clear.
